Query:
SELECT top 10
    DBOECU.DBCOR_COMPANY, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_ORDER_NBR, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_STATUS, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_PROCESS_LEVEL, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_ORDER_TYPE, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_ORDER_DATE, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_CUSTOMER, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_BILL_NAME, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_HOLD_CODE, 
	DBOECU.DBCOR_OPEN_ORD_AMT,
    DBARKU.DBACM_HOLD_CODE,
    DBOECL.DBCOL_LINE_NBR, 
	DBOECL.DBCOL_STATUS, 
	DBOECL.DBCOL_PROCESS_LEVEL, 
	DBOECL.DBCOL_ENTERED_PRICE, 
	DBOECL.DBCOL_SELL_UNIT_PRC, 
	DBOECL.DBCOL_SHIPPED_QTY,
    DBWHWDM.DBWDM_SYSTEM_CD, 
	DBWHWDM.DBWDM_ALLOC_QTY, 
	DBWHWDM.DBWDM_PRINTED_QTY
FROM
    KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBBLCOR DBOECU 
	INNER JOIN KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBBLCOL DBOECL ON
        DBOECU.DBCOR_COMPANY = DBOECL.DBCOL_COMPANY AND
    DBOECU.DBCOR_ORDER_NBR = DBOECL.DBCOL_ORDER_NBR
     INNER JOIN KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBARACM DBARKU ON
        DBOECU.DBCOR_COMPANY = DBARKU.DBACM_COMPANY AND
    DBOECU.DBCOR_CUSTOMER = DBARKU.DBACM_CUSTOMER
     INNER JOIN KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBWHWDM DBWHWDM ON
        DBOECL.DBCOL_COMPANY = DBWHWDM.DBWDM_COMPANY AND
    DBOECL.DBCOL_ORDER_NBR = DBWHWDM.DBWDM_DOC_NBR_NUM AND
    DBOECL.DBCOL_LINE_NBR = DBWHWDM.DBWDM_LINE_NBR
WHERE
    (DBOECU.DBCOR_STATUS = 2 OR
    DBOECU.DBCOR_STATUS = 1) AND
    (DBOECU.DBCOR_HOLD_CODE <> '' OR
    DBARKU.DBACM_HOLD_CODE <> '') AND
    DBWHWDM.DBWDM_SYSTEM_CD = 'OE' AND
    DBOECU.DBCOR_COMPANY = 2
Notes:
-- Updated by patrick@simplesoftwaresf.com on 7/3/2013 at 14:11:31
-- Updated by patrick@simplesoftwaresf.com on 7/3/2013 at 3:58:18 PM

Query:
SELECT 
TOP 10
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_COMPANY, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_ORDER_NBR, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_STATUS, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_PROCESS_LEVEL, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_ORDER_TYPE, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_ORDER_DATE, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_CUSTOMER, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_BILL_NAME, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_HOLD_CODE, 
	DBBLCOR.DBCOR_OPEN_ORD_AMT
FROM
	KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBBLCOR DBBLCOR
WHERE
    DBBLCOR.DBCOR_STATUS in (1,2) AND
    DBBLCOR.DBCOR_HOLD_CODE <> '' AND
    DBBLCOR.DBCOR_COMPANY = 1

and DBBLCOR.DBCOR_ORDER_NBR = '$$DBCOR_ORDER_NBR$$'
Notes:
-- Updated by patrick@simplesoftwaresf.com on 7/3/2013 at 14:11:35
-- Updated by patrick@simplesoftwaresf.com on 7/3/2013 at 3:58:23 PM

Query:
SELECT
    DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY", DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER", DBARACM."DBACM_ACTIVE_STATUS", DBARACM."DBACM_SEARCH_NAME", DBARACM."DBACM_SALESMAN",
    DBARCON."DBCON_RESP_CODE", DBARCON."DBCON_NAME"
FROM
    KITTY."KITTY"."LAWDBF7"."DBARACM" DBARACM LEFT OUTER JOIN KITTY."KITTY"."LAWDBF7"."DBARCON" DBARCON ON
        DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" = DBARCON."DBCON_COMPANY" AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER" = DBARCON."DBCON_CUSTOMER"
WHERE
    DBARACM."DBACM_ACTIVE_STATUS" <> 'I' AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" = 2 AND
    DBARCON."DBCON_RESP_CODE" LIKE 'E%'
ORDER BY
    DBARACM."DBACM_SALESMAN" ASC
Notes:
-- Updated by wlim@sanrio.com on 6/14/2013 at 5:12:59 PM
-- Updated by wlim@sanrio.com on 6/14/2013 at 5:13:38 PM

Query:
SELECT
    Sales_Summary."DBST_COMPANY", Sales_Summary."DBST_YEAR", Sales_Summary."DBST_PERIOD", Sales_Summary."DBST_ACTUAL_SALES", Sales_Summary."DBST_ACTUAL_DISC",
    DBARACF."DBACF_CUST_USER1",
    default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_SHIP_TO", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_NAME", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_ADDR1", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_ADDR2", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_ADDR3", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_ADDR4", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_CITY", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_STATE", default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_ZIP",
    DBARCUD."DBCUD_SEARCH_NAME", DBARCUD."DBCUD_ADDR1", DBARCUD."DBCUD_ADDR2", DBARCUD."DBCUD_ADDR3", DBARCUD."DBCUD_ADDR4", DBARCUD."DBCUD_CITY", DBARCUD."DBCUD_STATE", DBARCUD."DBCUD_ZIP", DBARCUD."DBCUD_PHONE_NMBR",
    DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER", DBARACM."DBACM_ACTIVE_STATUS", DBARACM."DBACM_HOLD_CODE", DBARACM."DBACM_CREDIT_LIM", DBARACM."DBACM_STATIC_CUR", DBARACM."DBACM_AGING_01", DBARACM."DBACM_AGING_02", DBARACM."DBACM_AGING_03", DBARACM."DBACM_AGING_04", DBARACM."DBACM_AGING_05",
    DBARSAW_Subrep."DBSAW_SALESMAN", DBARSAW_Subrep."DBSAW_NAME",
    vDBARCON."DBCON_NAME",
    DBARSAW."DBSAW_SALESMAN", DBARSAW."DBSAW_NAME"
FROM
     ((((((("Lawson7N"."dbo"."Sales_Summary" Sales_Summary LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."DBARACF" DBARACF ON
        Sales_Summary."DBST_COMPANY" = DBARACF."DBACF_COMPANY" AND
    Sales_Summary."DBST_CUSTOMER" = DBARACF."DBACF_CUSTOMER")
     LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."default_ship_to_view" default_ship_to_view ON
        Sales_Summary."DBST_COMPANY" = default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_COMPANY" AND
    Sales_Summary."DBST_CUSTOMER" = default_ship_to_view."DBSHP_CUSTOMER")
     LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."DBARCUD" DBARCUD ON
        Sales_Summary."DBST_CUSTOMER" = DBARCUD."DBCUD_CUSTOMER")
     INNER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."DBARACM" DBARACM ON
        Sales_Summary."DBST_COMPANY" = DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" AND
    Sales_Summary."DBST_CUSTOMER" = DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER")
     LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."DBAROET" DBAROET ON
        Sales_Summary."DBST_COMPANY" = DBAROET."DBOET_COMPANY" AND
    Sales_Summary."DBST_CUSTOMER" = DBAROET."DBOET_CUSTOMER")
     LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."vDBARCON" vDBARCON ON
        DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" = vDBARCON."DBCON_COMPANY" AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER" = vDBARCON."DBCON_CUSTOMER")
     LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."DBARSAW" DBARSAW ON
        DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" = DBARSAW."DBSAW_COMPANY" AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_SALESMAN" = DBARSAW."DBSAW_SALESMAN")
     LEFT OUTER JOIN "Lawson7N"."dbo"."DBARSAW" DBARSAW_Subrep ON
        DBAROET."DBOET_COMPANY" = DBARSAW_Subrep."DBSAW_COMPANY" AND
    DBAROET."DBOET_SALESMAN_2" = DBARSAW_Subrep."DBSAW_SALESMAN"
WHERE
    DBARSAW."DBSAW_SALESMAN" = '$$DBSAW_SALESMAN$$' AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_ACTIVE_STATUS" <> 'I' AND
    Sales_Summary."DBST_COMPANY" = 2
ORDER BY
    DBARSAW."DBSAW_SALESMAN" ASC,
    DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER" ASC,
 Sales_Summary."DBST_YEAR", Sales_Summary."DBST_PERIOD"
Notes:
-- Updated by wlim@sanrio.com on 6/14/2013 at 5:24:37 PM
-- Updated by wlim@sanrio.com on 6/14/2013 at 5:26:45 PM
-- Updated by patrick@simplesoftwaresf.com on 7/3/2013 at 14:11:07
-- Updated by patrick@simplesoftwaresf.com on 7/3/2013 at 3:58:33 PM

Query:
select top 10
Box.OrderID, Box.BoxNumber, Box.BoxCount,
BoxDetail.*
from 
    SAVANT.SAVANT.SAVANT.Box Box
join SAVANT.SAVANT.SAVANT.BoxDetail BoxDetail on Box.BoxID = BoxDetail.BoxID
where Box.OrderID = '$$OrderID$$'
Notes:

Query:
SELECT
   DBSASIL.DBSIL_COMPANY, DBSASIL.DBSIL_INVC_PREFIX, DBSASIL.DBSIL_INVC_NUMBER, DBSASIL.DBSIL_LINE_NBR, DBSASIL.DBSIL_PROCESS_LEVEL, DBSASIL.DBSIL_CUSTOMER, DBSASIL.DBSIL_ITEM, DBSASIL.DBSIL_ITEM_DESC, DBSASIL.DBSIL_QUANTITY, DBSASIL.DBSIL_SELL_UNIT_PRC,
   DBARACM.DBACM_SEARCH_NAME,
   DBSASAI.DBSAI_INVOICE_DATE
FROM
   (KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBSASIL DBSASIL 
LEFT OUTER JOIN KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBSASAI DBSASAI ON
       DBSASIL.DBSIL_COMPANY = DBSASAI.DBSAI_COMPANY AND
   DBSASIL.DBSIL_INVC_PREFIX = DBSASAI.DBSAI_INVC_PREFIX AND
   DBSASIL.DBSIL_INVC_NUMBER = DBSASAI.DBSAI_INVC_NUMBER)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN KITTY.KITTY.LAWDBF7.DBARACM DBARACM ON
       DBSASIL.DBSIL_COMPANY = DBARACM.DBACM_COMPANY AND
   DBSASIL.DBSIL_CUSTOMER = DBARACM.DBACM_CUSTOMER
WHERE
   ( DBSASIL.DBSIL_ITEM = ('$$DBSIL_ITEM$$') or DBSASIL.DBSIL_ITEM = ('$$DBSIL_ITEM2$$'))
   AND
   DBSASIL.DBSIL_COMPANY = '$$DBSIL_COMPANY$$'
ORDER BY
   DBSASIL.DBSIL_ITEM ASC
Notes:
